name: Dungeon Strike Quest
description:
After learning the basics of GB Studio, I set out to create a game with a functional quest system and a basic structure. This is the result of that goal. My very first fully fleshed-out game! I hope you enjoy it! And I hope to make more games like this in the future!

PC CONTROLS:

START - Enter

SELECT - Shift

A - Z Key

B - X Key
